Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Middle Egypt, el-Amarna (Akhetaten); inc. el-Hagg Qandil, Q.41.6 Service Buildings Further South of GAT, EES 1932–1933
Credit Line: Gift of Mrs. John Hubbard and Egypt Exploration Society, 1933
Provenance: Excavated at Amarna 1932-1933 by the Egypt Exploration Society, and received by them in partage. Donated to the museum by Mrs. John Hubbard and the Egypt Exploration Society, 1933.
